title: [Large-Scale] Mobile-Based Intensive Short-Term Program for Strengthening Mathematics Competency

context.prior_knowledge: Basic arithmetic operation skills (addition, subtraction, multiplication, division)
context.additional_context: Course for learners with smartphone-only access to acquire workplace-ready practical math skills, applying formative feedback and responsive teaching methods to improve participation and achievement.

learning_goals: Learners can solve practical workplace problems by applying basic statistical calculations (mean, ratio, percentage) required in professional settings
Learners can analyze data collected through project-based assessments using mobile tools and generate visualized results
Learners can improve mathematical problem-solving processes by over 80% utilizing peer feedback and tutor feedback

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
